subject: Adobe Dreamweaver CS3 $59
body:
It is through cooperation, rather than conflict, that your greatest successes will be derived…

There are more things to alarm us than to harm us, and we suffer more often in apprehension than reality.

The first thing to be done by a biographer in estimating character is to examine the stubs of his victim's check-books.

To be a Christian without prayer is no more possible than to be alive without breathing.

The time to stop talking is when the other person nods his head affirmatively, but says nothing.

Cowards are cruel, but the brave love mercy and delight to save.

I am an idealist. I don't know where I'm going but I'm on my way.

A man's home may seem to be his castle on the outside inside, it is more often his nursery.

I am a Marxist... of the Groucho tendency.

It's okay to make mistakes. Mistakes are our teachers -- they help us to learn.

Experience is one thing you can't get for nothing.

They come into being not through demonstration but through revelation, through the medium of powerful personalities.

A structure becomes architectural, and not sculptural, when its elements no longer have their justification in nature.
